name: Pizza Tower: Super Hard (SAGE 2019 Demo Mod)
name_original: Pizza Tower: Super Hard (SAGE 2019 Demo Mod)
description:
The SAGE 2019 mod with level design changes that make the game much harder, initially uploaded to Mega, is now on Itch.io! There are much more obstacles in your way, S Rank requirements are much higher and most levels start Pizza Time earlier!

S Rank requirements:
Pizzascape - 12140
The Ancient Cheese - 11290
Bloodsauce Dungeon - 11000
Snick Challenge - 8760

Changes:

Preview
-Only contains Pizzascape

v1
-Contains all levels
-Slight tweaks on Pizzascape
-Updated title screen (Credits to Astro)

v2

-Minor tweaks in all levels
-Reworked Snick Challenge
-Leaning Nightmare is now replaced with Boss Theme instead of Roman Empire Theme (Both from the Asterix & Obelix XXL soundtrack)
-S Rank requirement for The Ancient Cheese increased from 11290 to 11470
-S Rank requirement for Bloodsauce Dungeon increased from 11000 to 11090
-S Rank requirement for Snick Challenge decreased from 8760 to 8700
-The Ancient Cheese's Pizza Time was decreased from 4 minutes and 30 seconds to 4 minutes and 20 seconds
-Tweaked Snick dialogue
-Snick Challenge is now unlocked by A ranking all levels
-You can now die in all levels by losing all your points and time
-All rank requirements are slightly higher
-You can now jump out of a crouch slide and mach slide
-Movement with the superjump charge is now slightly faster
-The stupid corner dive glitch is fixed
-Wall climbing is no longer cancelled by pressing backwards

v21

-Fixed stairs
-Snick now gets out of his .exe form when you beat Snick Challenge

Credits:

Dylfinedas (AKA Astro), for making the title logo
Qwerter and Core, for helping with coding
